featured.text: As the rumor of his scandal ______ quickly during the election campaign, more and more people began to question the honesty of the candidate.
It is both legally and _______ wrong to spread rumors about other people on the Internet.

definition.zh_def: 未經證實的消息或傳聞。
definition.en_def: A piece of information or a story that is passed from person to person but has not been confirmed as true.
definition.example: There was a rumor that the company would be closing down soon.
